text:
Don't buy Ola scooter, I have purchased ola scooter in dec-2024 , now it is in service centre from last month , The service centre is not responding, there service centre are full of ola scooter that has to be repaired,
When I call service centre they are always saying It will take 1 month more and one month already passed  , My work has been disturbed and I am travelling through the bus , My money is wasted in ola scooter.
It's a fraud company ola electric.
Once your vehicle got problem it will be in the service centre forever.

So think before purchasing ola scooter and it's bike .
author: @skeditzs06

text:
Servicing mei issue h lekin ye nayi company bhi h jis ne bahut saare scooters beche h. 
Research and development ko support dena chahiye, baaki Indian ev makers khud ki motor ya cells pe na k barabar kaam kr rahe h.  
Jis din China ne battery aur rare earth magnets pe aur kade kadam le liye uss time Ola jaise companies hi ev segment mei tikk payegi. 
Agar servicing aur spare parts ka issue solve ho jaye toh ye genuinely ek successful company banegi.  

PS: Aap ne dhyan diya hoga ki aaj kal Bhawish ne online b@kchod! kam kar di hai
